name: Murong Yi's Celestial Pet Zone
description:
Bright, cheerful and set in a Xianxia world filled with lush backdrops and soothing background music, Murong Yi's Celestial Pet Zone is a free and easy-to-play virtual pet simulation game. A player can adopt up to three different eggs, hatch them and raise the animals until adulthood.

The characters and pets are lovingly hand-drawn and cycles can be continued on loop until the player chooses to quit. You can forage for herbs and potions along the way too!

Be careful though, some of these little creatures can be pretty fussy!

Look after these little rascals and see what they transform into! Have fun and stay bright always! ✨

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created with the Ren'py Visual Novel engine for Virtual Pet Jam 2022.
